page.description: Creates a Panel shown on demand that renders in fixed location.

discussion.p: Used in a UX component with other Panels.
The controls inside a *[ui:PanelOverlay]* contaienr are rendered in a fixed position relative to an edge of the Panel containing the *[ui:PanelOverlay]*.
The *[ui:PanelOverlay]* is typically used to display 'floating' content (such as a toolbar) over a Panel.
If the *[ui:PanelOverlay]* container is inside a PanelNavigator, the floating content is displayed for every Panel in the PanelNavigator.
If the *[ui:PanelOverlay]* is insidea PanelCard, the floating content is only visible when the PanelCard containing the *[ui:PanelOverlay]* is visible.
